original_text: Then Paul saw that there were some Sadducees and also some Pharisees in the meeting. So he shouted out to the whole group of Jewish leaders, ‘My brothers, I am a Pharisee! My father was also a Pharisee. I believe that dead people will certainly rise and they will live again. That is the reason why you are judging me today.’
korean_text: 바울이 그 중 일부는 사두개인이요 다른 일부는 바리새인인 줄 알고 공회에서 외쳐 이르되 여러분 형제들아 나는 바리새인이요 또 바리새인의 아들이라 죽은 자의 소망 곧 부활로 말미암아 내가 심문을 받노라

sentences.original_text: Then Paul saw that there were some Sadducees
and also some Pharisees in the meeting
So he shouted out to the whole group of Jewish leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 유대 지도자 전체에게 외쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: My brothers, I am a Pharisee!
My father was also a Pharisee.
I believe that dead people will certainly rise
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 죽은 사람들이 반드시 부활할 것이라고 믿습니다

sentences.original_text: That is the reason why you are judging me today.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 오늘 당신들이 나를 심판하는 이유입니다.
